useDoiUrl.message: Use the preprint DOI or URL.

whatIsDoiText.message: A <doi>DOI</doi> is a unique identifier that you can find on many preprints. For example, {example} or {exampleUrl}.

errorEnterPreprint.message: <error>Error:</error> Enter the preprint DOI or URL

dontKnowPreprint.message: Sorry, we don’t know this preprint

unsupportedDoi.message: Sorry, we don’t support this DOI

unsupportedUrl.message: Sorry, we don’t support this URL

urlCouldBePhilsci.message: We think the URL {url} could be a PhilSci-Archive preprint, but we can’t find any details.

checkCorrectUrl.message: If you typed the URL, check it is correct.

checkPastedUrl.message: If you pasted the URL, check you copied the entire address.

urlIsCorrect.message: If the URL is correct, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

supportPreprintsFrom.message: We support preprints from Advance, AfricArXiv, Arcadia Science, arXiv, Authorea, bioRxiv, ChemRxiv, Curvenote, EarthArXiv, EcoEvoRxiv, EdArXiv, engrXiv, Jxiv, medRxiv, MetaArXiv, OSF, PhilSci-Archive, Preprints.org, PsyArXiv, PsychArchives, Research Square, SciELO, ScienceOpen, SocArXiv, TechRxiv, VeriXiv and Zenodo.

doiIsForPreprint.message: If this DOI is for a preprint on a server we don’t support, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

urlIsForPreprint.message: If this URL is for a preprint on a server we don’t support, please <contact>get in touch</contact>.

otherwiseUseDoi.message: Otherwise, if the preprint has a DOI, please try using that instead.

unableToPublishNow.message: We’re unable to publish PREreviews for this preprint now.
